name: ColdFusion: Prefer UNION ALL to UNION
description: List all CFqueries using UNION (without ALL).
output:
This report lists all CFQueries with SQL statement using UNION clause only.
It provides the following information: CFQueries full name
rationale: In SQL the UNION operator combines the results of two SQL queries into a single table of all matching rows. The two queries must have matching fields and data types in order to join them.   Any duplicate records are automatically removed unless UNION ALL is used.   The problem is that MOST of the time it is unecessary to remove duplicate as there are none and doing the search for duplicate rows can be very costly.
reference: Standard suggestions based on CAST Quality Model
remediation: Add the ALL after the union keyword (ensure that this does not change the returned data).
remediationSample:
select C1a, C2a
from Table1
union ALL                               // FIXED
select C1b, C2b
from Table2
sample:
select C1a, C2a
from Table1
union                             // VIOLATION
select C1b, C2b
from Table2

-- The database server will read the values, sort them and eliminate duplicates. This is costly and likely to be useless.

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - SQL and Data Handling Performance
